titleStmt.title: A discourse of faith in two points, viz ... / by Thomas Cole ...
titleStmt.author: Cole, Thomas, 1627?-1697.

notesStmt.note: "A discourse of repentance" (p. [81]-124) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
(from t.p.) I. How faith comes by hearing -- II. How we are justified by faith.
